00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : VGrid
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : Carlos Rosales Fernandez [carlos.rosales.fernandez(at)gmail.com]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00021

00036 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00037 
00038  SUBROUTINE VGrid
00039 
00040 ! Common variables
00041  USE Domain, ONLY : xl, xlg, xmax, xmin, xu, xug, yl, ylg, ymax, ymin, yu, yug
00042  USE MPIParams
00043  USE MPI
00044  IMPLICIT NONE
00045 
00046 ! Local variables
00047  INTEGER :: complete, direction, partial, shift
00048  INTEGER :: xeast, xwest, ynorth, ysouth, MPI_ERR
00049  INTEGER, DIMENSION(1:mpi_dim) :: dims, mpi_coords
00050  LOGICAL, DIMENSION(1:mpi_dim) :: periodic
00051  LOGICAL :: reorder
00052 
00053 
00054 ! Initialize data for domain partitioning. Defaults are:
00055 ! Partitioning is periodic in all dimensions (periodic = .true.)
00056 ! CPUs are reordered in the grid for proximity (reorder = .true.)
00057  dims(1)     = mpi_xdim
00058  dims(2)     = mpi_ydim
00059  periodic(1) = .true.
00060  periodic(2) = .true.
00061  reorder     = .true.
00062 
00063 ! Create the new virtual connectivity grid
00064  CALL MPI_CART_CREATE(MPI_COMM_WORLD, mpi_dim, dims, periodic, reorder, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00065 
00066 ! Get this processor ID within the virtual grid
00067  CALL MPI_COMM_RANK(MPI_COMM_VGRID, vproc, MPI_ERR)
00068  CALL MPI_CART_COORDS(MPI_COMM_VGRID, vproc, mpi_dim, mpi_coords, MPI_ERR)
00069 
00070 !-------- Compute the limits [(xl,xu),(yl,yu)] assigned to this processor ------
00071 ! Partitioning in the x direction
00072  CALL MPI_CART_COORDS(MPI_COMM_VGRID, vproc, mpi_dim, mpi_coords, MPI_ERR)
00073  complete = (xmax - xmin) / dims(1)
00074  partial  = (xmax - xmin) - complete*dims(1)
00075  IF(mpi_coords(1) + 1 <= partial) THEN
00076    xl = xmin + (complete + 1)*mpi_coords(1)
00077    xu = xmin + (complete + 1)*(mpi_coords(1) + 1) - 1
00078  ELSE
00079    xl = xmin + complete*mpi_coords(1) + partial
00080    xu = xmin + complete*(mpi_coords(1) + 1) + partial - 1
00081  END IF
00082  IF(MOD(mpi_coords(1) + 1,dims(1)) == 0) xu = xu + 1
00083 
00084 ! Partitioning in the y direction
00085  complete = (ymax - ymin) / dims(2)
00086  partial  = (ymax - ymin) - complete*dims(2)
00087  IF(mpi_coords(2) + 1 <= partial) THEN
00088    yl = ymin + (complete + 1)*mpi_coords(2)
00089    yu = ymin + (complete + 1)*(mpi_coords(2) + 1) - 1
00090  ELSE
00091    yl = ymin + complete*mpi_coords(2) + partial
00092    yu = ymin + complete*(mpi_coords(2) + 1) + partial - 1
00093  END IF
00094  IF(MOD(mpi_coords(2) + 1,dims(2)) == 0) yu = yu + 1
00095 
00096 ! Ghost layers
00097  xlg = xl - 1
00098  xug = xu + 1
00099  ylg = yl - 1
00100  yug = yu + 1
00101 
00102 !-------- Determine neighbours of this processor -------------------------------
00103 ! MPI_CART counts dimensions using 0-based arithmetic so that
00104 ! direction = 0 -> x  |  direction = 1 -> y
00105 ! Ranks of neighbours of this processor in the x and y directions
00106  shift     = 1
00107  direction = 0
00108  CALL MPI_CART_SHIFT(MPI_COMM_VGRID, direction, shift, west, east, MPI_ERR)
00109  direction = 1
00110  CALL MPI_CART_SHIFT(MPI_COMM_VGRID, direction, shift, south, north, MPI_ERR)
00111 
00112 ! Coordinates of neighbours of this processor in the x and y directions
00113  CALL MPI_CART_COORDS(MPI_COMM_VGRID, east, mpi_dim, mpi_coords, MPI_ERR)
00114  xeast = mpi_coords(1)
00115 
00116  CALL MPI_CART_COORDS(MPI_COMM_VGRID, west, mpi_dim, mpi_coords, MPI_ERR)
00117  xwest = mpi_coords(1)
00118 
00119  CALL MPI_CART_COORDS(MPI_COMM_VGRID, north, mpi_dim, mpi_coords, MPI_ERR)
00120  ynorth = mpi_coords(2)
00121 
00122  CALL MPI_CART_COORDS(MPI_COMM_VGRID, south, mpi_dim, mpi_coords, MPI_ERR)
00123  ysouth = mpi_coords(2)
00124 
00125 ! Ranks of the diagonal neighbours of this processor
00126  mpi_coords(1) = xeast
00127  mpi_coords(2) = ynorth
00128  CALL MPI_CART_RANK(MPI_COMM_VGRID,mpi_coords,ne,MPI_ERR)
00129 
00130  mpi_coords(1) = xwest
00131  mpi_coords(2) = ysouth
00132  CALL MPI_CART_RANK(MPI_COMM_VGRID,mpi_coords,sw,MPI_ERR)
00133 
00134  mpi_coords(1) = xwest
00135  mpi_coords(2) = ynorth
00136  CALL MPI_CART_RANK(MPI_COMM_VGRID,mpi_coords,nw,MPI_ERR)
00137 
00138  mpi_coords(1) = xeast
00139  mpi_coords(2) = ysouth
00140  CALL MPI_CART_RANK(MPI_COMM_VGRID,mpi_coords,se,MPI_ERR)
00141 
00142  RETURN
00143  END SUBROUTINE VGrid
Generated on Sun Jun 15 17:06:52 2008 for ZSC-2D-STD-MPI by  1.5.6
